metadata.title: CVE-2021-47141 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: gve:Add NULL pointer checks when freeing irqs. When freeing notificationblocks, we index priv->msix_vectors. If we failed to allocatepriv->msix_vectors (see abort_with_msix_vectors) this could lead to a NULLpointer dereference if the driver is unloaded.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
